original_text: But the group who wanted Omri to be king was stronger than the other group. As a result, Tibni died. Then Omri became the king of Israel.
korean_text: 오므리를 따른 백성이 기낫의 아들 디브니를 따른 백성을 이긴지라 디브니가 죽으매 오므리가 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: But the group who wanted Omri to be king
was stronger than the other group
Then Omri became the king of Israel
